DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine best scheme paclitaxel cisplatin，paclitaxel fluorouracil，paclitaxel carboplatin concurrent radiotherapy patient local advance esophageal Squamous Cell Carcinoma .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Paclitaxel-based Three Regimens Concurrent With Radiotherapy Patients With Local Advanced Esophageal Cancer
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion To eligible study , patient must fulfill follow criterion : 1 . Histologically confirm esophageal squamous cell carcinoma 2 . Clinical stage II , III IVa base 6th UICCTNM classification 3 . No prior treatment chemotherapy , radiotherapy surgery esophageal cancer , except noncurative resection EMR/ESD . 4 . Aged 1875 year 5 . Adequate organ function 1 . White blood cell ( WBC ) ≥3×109⁄L 2 . Absolute neutrophil count ( ANC ) ≥1.5×109⁄L 3 . Hemoglobin ( Hb ) ≥10g⁄dl 4 . Platelet ( Plt ) ≥100×109⁄L 5 . Total bilirubin < 1.5 upper limit normal ( ULN ) 6 . Aspartate transaminase ( AST ) ≤2.5 ULN 7 . Alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) ≤2.5 ULN 8 . Creatinine ≤1.5 ULN 6 . ECOG PS 02 7 . Life expectancy ≥3 month 8 . Written inform consent Exclusion criterion Patients fulfil follow criterion ineligible study . 1 . Esophageal perforation hematemesis 2 . Synchronous metachronous malignancy ( except cutaneous ( nonmelanomas ) carcinoma , thyroid papillary carcinoma , phase I seminoma cervical carcinoma situ curatively treat disease free minimum 3 month ) 3 . Received thoracic , abdominal craniocerebral surgery within 30 day 4 . Enrolled clinical trial within 30 day 5 . Unstable angina and/or congestive heart failure require hospitalization within 6 month 6 . Severe psychiatric disease 7 . Pregnancy , lactation unwillingness adopt contraception 8 . Drug addiction 9 . Acquired immune deficiency syndrome ( AIDS ) base upon current CDC definition 10 . Patients hear impairment sensorymotor neuropathy WHO grade > 1 11 . History radiotherapy plan area 12 . Other ineligible condition accord researcher
